name: Dog Agility 3D
summary:
Start your agility addiction!
Play the internationally popular sport of dog agility on your iPhone, iPad or iPod. In Dog Agility 3D you maneuver your dog through four different types of agility courses using the tilt control functionality of your device in pursuit of Qualifying Runs and Agility Titles. Dog agility enthusiasts, dog lovers and action game lovers alike will get hours of entertainment from Dog Agility 3D!
Choose your dog, give it a name, practice on the included training courses and start your agility addiction!
